sentences.sContent: He started to explain, but he didn’t get far (= he did not succeed in saying very much ) before Mary interrupted him.
sentences.sCn: 他开始解释起来，但没说几句就被玛丽打断了。

sentences.sContent: Many people felt that the new law did not go far enough (= did not have a big enough effect, so that more needed to be done ) .
sentences.sCn: 许多人认为新的法律力度不够。

synos.tran: 很；遥远地；久远地；到很远的距离；到很深的程度

trans.tranOther: used to talk about how much progress someone makes, or how much effect something has
